languages.text: После уничтожения Летуса часть десятины Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус направил{mf||а} на восстановление миров Простора Коронус, пострадавших от ксеносов, еретиков и ужасов пустоты. Многие миры сумели выжить лишь благодаря этой помощи, хотя этот широкий жест и не встретил понимания со стороны аристократов. Спустя несколько лет на мирах, по которым распределили десятину, распространилась чудовищная хворь, прозванная "Проклятье Летуса". Было ли это и вправду связано с десятиной или было попыткой очернить защитни{mf|ка|цу} Простора, так никто и не узнал.

Following the destruction of Leethus, Rogue Trader von Valancius directed part of its tithe toward restoring Koronus Expanse worlds that had suffered from xenos, heretics, and the horrors of the void. Many of them only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds to which the tithe had been distributed were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it truly was related to the tithe or a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector forever remained a mystery.
languages.original_text: После уничтожения Летуса часть десятины Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус направил{mf||а} на восстановление миров Простора Коронус, пострадавших от ксеносов, еретиков и ужасов пустоты. Многие миры сумели выжить лишь благодаря этой помощи, хотя этот широкий жест и не встретил понимания со стороны аристократов. Спустя несколько лет на мирах, по которым распределили десятину, распространилась чудовищная хворь, прозванная "Проклятье Летуса". Было ли это и вправду связано с десятиной или было попыткой очернить защитни{mf|ка|цу} Простора, так никто и не узнал.

traits.locale_text: Following the destruction of Leethus, Rogue Trader von Valancius directed part of its tithe toward restoring Koronus Expanse worlds that had suffered from xenos, heretics, and the horrors of the void. Many of the worlds only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds the tithe had been distributed to were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it really had to do with the tithe, or if it was a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector, remained forever unknown.

Many of them only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds to which the tithe had been distributed were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it truly was related to the tithe or a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector forever remained a mystery.

languages.text: Nach der Zerstörung von Leethus investierte {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius einen Teil des Zehnts in die Wiederherstellung von Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung, die unter Xenos, Ketzern und den Schrecken der Leere gelitten hatten. Viele von ihnen überlebten nur dank dieser Unterstützung, obgleich die Geste bei Aristokraten nur auf wenig Verständnis stieß. Einige Jahre später brach auf den Welten, die von der Verteilung des Zehnts profitiert hatten, eine schreckliche Krankheit aus, die als Leethus-Fluch bekannt wurde. Ob sie wirklich etwas mit dem Zehnt zu tun hatte oder nur ein Versuch war, {mf|den Beschützer|die Beschützerin} der Ausdehnung zu diskreditieren, blieb für immer ein Geheimnis.
languages.original_text: Following the destruction of Leethus, Rogue Trader von Valancius directed part of its tithe toward restoring Koronus Expanse worlds that had suffered from xenos, heretics, and the horrors of the void. Many of them only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds to which the tithe had been distributed were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it truly was related to the tithe or a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector forever remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Zerstörung von Leethus investierte {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius einen Teil des Zehnts in die Wiederherstellung von Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung, die unter Xenos, Ketzern und den Schrecken der Leere gelitten hatten. Viele von ihnen überlebten nur dank dieser Unterstützung, obgleich die Geste bei Aristokraten nur auf wenig Verständnis stieß. Einige Jahre später brach auf den Welten, die von der Verteilung des Zehnts profitiert hatten, eine schreckliche Krankheit aus, die als Leethus-Fluch bekannt wurde. languages.text: Après la destruction de Leethus, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius consacra une partie de sa dîme à la restauration des mondes des Étendues de Koronus qui avaient subi le joug des xénos, des hérétiques et d'autres horreurs du vide. Bien que de nombreux mondes ne durent leur salut qu'à cette aide précieuse, les aristocrates ne firent même pas semblant de comprendre ce geste par trop généreux. Quelques années plus tard, les mondes ayant bénéficié de la dîme furent frappés par une effroyable maladie, que l'on appela plus tard « la malédiction de Leethus ». Qu'elle soit réellement liée à la dîme ou qu'il s'agisse d'une simple tentative de calomnie à l'encontre {mf|du protecteur|de la protectrice} des Étendues, la réponse restera à jamais un mystère.
languages.original_text: Following the destruction of Leethus, Rogue Trader von Valancius directed part of its tithe toward restoring Koronus Expanse worlds that had suffered from xenos, heretics, and the horrors of the void. Many of them only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds to which the tithe had been distributed were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it truly was related to the tithe or a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector forever remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: Après la destruction de Leethus, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius consacra une partie de sa dîme à la restauration des mondes des Étendues de Koronus qui avaient subi le joug des xénos, des hérétiques et d'autres horreurs du vide. Bien que de nombreux mondes ne durent leur salut qu'à cette aide précieuse, les aristocrates ne firent même pas semblant de comprendre ce geste par trop généreux. Quelques années plus tard, les mondes ayant bénéficié de la dîme furent frappés par une effroyable maladie, que l'on appela plus tard « la malédiction de Leethus ». Qu'elle soit réellement liée à la dîme ou qu'il s'agisse d'une simple tentative de calomnie à l'encontre {mf|du protecteur|de la protectrice} des Étendues, la réponse restera à jamais un mystère.

languages.text: 利瑟斯毁灭之后，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人挪用了部分什一税，将这些资源用于支援科罗努斯扩区的众多世界。那些饱受异形、异端分子、虚空恐怖之物所苦的世界，终于等来了救援。这些世界的众多臣民靠着救援物资活了下来，但众多贵族并不理解这种慷慨的善举。几年后，所有获得什一税资源的世界都爆发了某种可怕的疾病，这种疾病后来被称为“利瑟斯诅咒”。至于这场疾病是真的与什一税有关，还是仅仅是有人打算诽谤科罗努斯扩区的守护者，答案依然成谜。
languages.original_text: Following the destruction of Leethus, Rogue Trader von Valancius directed part of its tithe toward restoring Koronus Expanse worlds that had suffered from xenos, heretics, and the horrors of the void. Many of them only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds to which the tithe had been distributed were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it truly was related to the tithe or a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector forever remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: 利瑟斯毁灭之后，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人挪用了部分什一税，将这些资源用于支援科罗努斯扩区的众多世界。那些饱受异形、异端分子、虚空恐怖之物所苦的世界，终于等来了救援。这些世界的众多臣民靠着救援物资活了下来，但众多贵族并不理解这种慷慨的善举。几年后，所有获得什一税资源的世界都爆发了某种可怕的疾病，这种疾病后来被称为“利瑟斯诅咒”。至于这场疾病是真的与什一税有关，还是仅仅是有人打算诽谤科罗努斯扩区的守护者，答案依然成谜。

languages.text: Tras la destrucción de Leethus, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius dedicó parte del diezmo a la restauración de los mundos de la Extensión de Koronus que habían sufrido los ataques de xenos, herejes y los horrores del vacío. Muchos de ellos solo sobrevivieron gracias a su ayuda, aunque los aristócratas no terminaron de comprender este gesto. Unos años más tarde, los mundos a los que se había distribuido el diezmo sufrieron una terrible enfermedad a la que se consideró la maldición de Leethus. Jamás se supo si tenía alguna relación real con el diezmo o si era un intento de difamar a{mf|l| la} protector{mf||a} de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: Following the destruction of Leethus, Rogue Trader von Valancius directed part of its tithe toward restoring Koronus Expanse worlds that had suffered from xenos, heretics, and the horrors of the void. Many of them only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds to which the tithe had been distributed were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it truly was related to the tithe or a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector forever remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: Tras la destrucción de Leethus, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius dedicó parte del diezmo a la restauración de los mundos de la Extensión de Koronus que habían sufrido los ataques de xenos, herejes y los horrores del vacío. Muchos de ellos solo sobrevivieron gracias a su ayuda, aunque los aristócratas no terminaron de comprender este gesto. Unos años más tarde, los mundos a los que se había distribuido el diezmo sufrieron una terrible enfermedad a la que se consideró la maldición de Leethus. Jamás se supo si tenía alguna relación real con el diezmo o si era un intento de difamar a{mf|l| la} protector{mf||a} de la Extensión.

languages.text: リーザス滅亡後、ローグトレーダー、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、その租税の一部を、異種族や異端者、虚空の恐怖によって苦しめられていたコロヌス・エクスパンスの諸惑星の復興にあてるよう指示した。多くの惑星はその援助のおかげでなんとか生き延びることができたが、こうした広範な慈善の行為は貴族たちの理解をほとんど得られなかった。数年後、援助を受けた惑星のいくつかを、のちに「リーザスの呪い」と呼ばれるおぞましい疫病が襲った。その疫病が本当に租税と関係していたのか、それともエクスパンスの守護者に汚名を着せるための中傷にすぎなかったのかは、永遠に謎のままである。
languages.original_text: Following the destruction of Leethus, Rogue Trader von Valancius directed part of its tithe toward restoring Koronus Expanse worlds that had suffered from xenos, heretics, and the horrors of the void. Many of them only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds to which the tithe had been distributed were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it truly was related to the tithe or a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector forever remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: リーザス滅亡後、ローグトレーダー、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、その租税の一部を、異種族や異端者、虚空の恐怖によって苦しめられていたコロヌス・エクスパンスの諸惑星の復興にあてるよう指示した。多くの惑星はその援助のおかげでなんとか生き延びることができたが、こうした広範な慈善の行為は貴族たちの理解をほとんど得られなかった。数年後、援助を受けた惑星のいくつかを、のちに「リーザスの呪い」と呼ばれるおぞましい疫病が襲った。その疫病が本当に租税と関係していたのか、それともエクスパンスの守護者に汚名を着せるための中傷にすぎなかったのかは、永遠に謎のままである。

languages.text: Leethus'un yıkımının ardından Hür Tacir von Valancius; bu aşarın bir kısmını zenolardan, kâfirlerden ve uçsuzun dehşetinden nasibini almış Koronus Enginliği dünyalarını ihya etmeye tahsis etti. Birçoğu yalnızca bu yardım sayesinde ayakta kalabildi. Gerçi aristokratlar, bu büyük cömertliği pek de anlayamadı. Aşarın dağıtıldığı dünyalar, birkaç yıl sonra Leethus Laneti olarak nam salan korkunç bir hastalığın pençesine düştü. Bu durumun gerçekten aşarla mı ilgili olduğu yoksa Enginlik'in hamisine leke sürmek için yapılan basit bir teşebbüs mü olduğu ebediyen bir muamma olarak kaldı.
languages.original_text: Following the destruction of Leethus, Rogue Trader von Valancius directed part of its tithe toward restoring Koronus Expanse worlds that had suffered from xenos, heretics, and the horrors of the void. Many of them only survived thanks to that aid, although the broad gesture was met with scant understanding by aristocrats. Some years later, the worlds to which the tithe had been distributed were struck by a ghastly disease that came to be known as the Leethus Curse. Whether it truly was related to the tithe or a mere attempt to slander the Expanse's protector forever remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: Leethus'un yıkımının ardından Hür Tacir von Valancius; bu aşarın bir kısmını zenolardan, sapkınlardan ve boşluğun dehşetinden nasibini almış Koronus Enginliği dünyalarını ihya etmeye tahsis etti. Birçoğu yalnızca bu yardım sayesinde ayakta kalabildi. Gerçi aristokratlar, bu büyük cömertliği pek de anlayamadı. Birkaç yıl sonra, aşarın dağıtıldığı dünyalar Leethus Laneti olarak nam salan korkunç bir hastalığın pençesine düştü. Bu durumun gerçekten aşarla mı ilgili olduğu, yoksa Enginlik'in hamisine leke sürmek için yapılan basit bir teşebbüs mü olduğu ebediyen bir muamma olarak kaldı.
